articles.title: Barnstable educator allegedly fired over Facebook posts sues district
articles.description:
“Public schools do not get to silence employees simply because they express opinions that administrators dislike,” said the president of Judicial Watch, a conservative group that filed the lawsuit.

The post Barnstable educator allegedly fired over Facebook posts sues district appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Barnstable educator allegedly fired over Facebook

articles.title: Federal officer shoots person in leg after being attacked during Minneapolis arrest, AP source says
articles.description:
